pitt.search.semanticvectors

Interface VectorStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CloseableVectorStore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DocVectors, ElementalVectorStore, IncrementalTermVectors, SRI, VectorStoreDeterministic, VectorStoreOrthographical, VectorStoreRAM, VectorStoreReaderLucene, VectorStoreReaderText

    public interface VectorStore
    Classes implementing this interface are used to represent a collection of object vectors, including i. methods for accessing individual ObjectVectors and ii. an enumeration of all the vectors.
    Author:
    Dominic Widdows, Trevor Cohen
    See Also:
    ObjectVector

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsVector(Object object)
      Returns true if the vector store already contains a vector for this object.
      Enumeration<ObjectVector> getAllVectors()
      Returns an enumeration of all the object vectors in the store.
      int getNumVectors()
      Returns a count of the number of vectors in the store.
      Vector getVector(Object object)
      Returns the vector stored for this object.

    • Method Detail

      • getVector

        Vector getVector(Object object)
        Returns the vector stored for this object. (Support is only tested for String objects.)

      • containsVector

        boolean containsVector(Object object)
        Returns true if the vector store already contains a vector for this object. (Support is only tested for String objects.)

      • getAllVectors

        Enumeration<ObjectVector> getAllVectors()
        Returns an enumeration of all the object vectors in the store.

      • getNumVectors

        int getNumVectors()
        Returns a count of the number of vectors in the store.
